conversation.text: I like the sound of Nell. Who stars in it? That feels deeper than I thought.

conversation.speaker: SYSTEM
conversation.text: Based on your preferences for a heist genre movie, starring Kate Nelligan and written by Mordecai Richler, I'd recommend you watch 'The Thomas Crown Affair'. This film, featuring Faye Dunaway and Pierce Brosnan, revolves around a very rich playboy who amuses himself by stealing artwork. Enjoy!
